sections.heading: Bonds; notice of issuance; publication; contents
sections.text: The board of directors shall give notice by publication once each week for three consecutive weeks of the proposed issue of bonds and the amount thereof.SourceLaws 1907, c. 153, ยง 15, p. 481;Laws 1911, c. 145, ยง 1, p. 485;R.S.1913, ยง 1882;C.S.1922, ยง
